website_summaries.verdict: Nice option if you want a sleek design for a good price.
pros: Modern wood, canvas, and rope design that looks great in an office
Comes in a bright and cheery color
cons: The clips are not universal, so your desk must fit the required measurements

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - you may have to make some modifications
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed on my corner cubicle desk. It did have a tendency to slide forward because of the hooks being on two sides of a corner and because the desk was thinner than the hooks were designed for. However, I was able to place one hook behind a desk support and the other I wedged cardboard under and taped it down and it was secure. Now everyone I show wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Cute and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: A godsend for people whose legs are too short to reach the ground. The metal hooks don't seem to be adjustable, which can be a problem depending on your desk. I can't get mine to securely clamp on my desk so they're just hanging loosely, but they stay in place if I don't move too much so it's fine. Clamps aren't very pretty so I keep them hidden with office stuff, but the hammock itself looks cute, and is sturdy and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C.

customer_reviews.title: my coworkers have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I like the product but unless you can adjust how close it is to the front and back of your desk I would not purchase. Because I can only have it hung across the middle of my desk I have to scoot back to be able to lay my legs in it. It is still comfortable and for the price I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: The bars that affix to the desk aren’t usable with the style desk I have. I didn’t think that through when I bought it. I’d recommend buying this ONLY if your desk style matches the one in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Gamlem

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for new desk
customer_reviews.text: I love it, bought this foot hammock for new sit/stand desk.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for almost a year and it is great! You can adjust it to any height. It fits my super wide desk. Helps my tired legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift for my husband for ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband for his new desk job. He loves it and keeps telling me that all the people he works with are very jealous.
customer_reviews.author: KarenTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Does  what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my mom she is at work so her fat wouldn’t sweat it works great
customer_reviews.author: Ema Le

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It is temporary and can remove at any ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is temporary and can remove at any time you want, but does case some damage to the spots where it is hooked.It is easily adjustable to fit your comfort and height needs, the weight and force applied to the brackets from my legs prevent the brackets from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Tang Li

customer_reviews.title: I like it alot
customer_reviews.text: Came early, I like it alot, easy to assemble and my feet are up.. Works well with sit stand desk since it raises with the desk so it's always the right height for me..
customer_reviews.author: drasian

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive solution to common problem. It is very comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: KittenJD2B

customer_reviews.title: 5-star product, 7 star customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older one that doesn't bear leg weight from another brand, which required you to tighten the robe, which makes it less flexible. This one works better. and the customer service from this vendor is really great. We had a really great correspondence on my experience with it, and they were open to new ideas.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Just like an swing
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting design, I could put it on my feet, feels just like a swing. The product itself is very solid, doesn t look like will fall apart when using. Now I place it under my desk, when I had to extend my work hour till late, this thing makes me keep on going! It kind of give me energy when I was out of inspiration, or kind of stress out. Fun to swing around when boring, I really like it, would recommend it to my co-workers and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Everett

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use
customer_reviews.text: None of the desks I use accommodate this sling. There are not multiple ways to attach, so you may have to work to make adjustments for using this. I thought it would be great because it doesn't use floor space. It is not very functional, however, and I have been trying to come up with an alternate use. Unfortunately, it is too small to hold any items for a kind of shelving. It's still in the box awaiting inspiration.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gatz

customer_reviews.title: Needs adjustable desk clips
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at these for a long time and finally decided to try it out. I was disappointed. The clips don't work with my desk. It is not tight enough so as soon as I put my feet up the entire thing slides. I tried putting a book between to make it a tighter fit, that didn't work. I also tried taping it in place and that didn't work either. Unless you know it will fit the exact size of your desk, I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to relax at work with this hammock
customer_reviews.text: This little piece of cloth (canvas?) hangs under your desk or table to give you a place to put your feet up. Surprisingly nice in the office. If nothing else it helps give you another position to sit in instead of constantly being locked into office chair position . The metal hooks it comes with are sturdy and should last forever. I am glad we picked this up as it gets used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rojas

customer_reviews.title: But the ropes are sturdy as are the stoppers
customer_reviews.text: Does its job well enough able to get it to work without too much trouble. the cloth does tend to slide on the wood at times and needs readjusted often. But the ropes are sturdy as are the stoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Holy great!
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, comfortable.It's fairly simple - but you need to figure out how best to rig it to suit your needs and the limits of your furniture. My desk is one of those Ikea ones with a fabric cord keeper underneath, and I was able to hang it easily.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN HABURA

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2 years and 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: It became unusable after 2 years and 4 months. The wood blocks would shift. For the money, over 2 years is OK, but cannot give it more than 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: This fits under my desk. Fabric is rough. Had to hang it so high it's hard to get my leg in there.
customer_reviews.author: Living Simply

customer_reviews.title: Cool little gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I used it a couple times. Not worth the hassle for me personally but it does its job so, I’m not mad. Definitely comfortable when I used it, and it was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable, comfortable! I’m happy with this product, i keep my shoes on and it has yet to fray. The cord rope is still intact after a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: THE DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, hard to get set up comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice idea but did not work practically under an office desk, could never get to an comfortable position.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli N. Whithorn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay installed properly, very hard to make it work.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this but it never stays put, loosens up so that it touches the ground, and overall just doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap, but it works
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap, especially the threads to reposition the location of the hammock. It works fine though. The clips just hang onto the edge and can easily fall off. I don't put it on either size of my desk but more at an angle so I had to secure it with sticky tack.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: does not work for corner desks. Sticky pads did not hold the weight of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lead

customer_reviews.title: Few will like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a smart idea but to find the ideal situation in which this would work is near impossible. Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harris Hassan

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN LESS THAN 2 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks! It broke on me inless than a couple months just from resting my feet in it in a sitting position!!! Don't waste your money ! Find a better quality version of the same thing is what I'd recommend 😠 -5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Davinci

customer_reviews.title: ok but not so comfy as a small foot stool ...
customer_reviews.text: ok but not so comfy as a small foot stool...feet tend to push together and gets uncomfortable very quickly...if the cloth area had a frame it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: it is a very great product.
customer_reviews.text: The foot hammock does what it is supposed to. However, the ropes are a bit finnicky when it comes to adjusting the lengths. Other than that, it is a very great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It hangs well but it's not an comfy as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice try but didn't fit!
customer_reviews.text: Good material. Poor instructions drawing. Didn't fit my cubical... Womp womp.
customer_reviews.author: Embry Gillet

customer_reviews.title: Good, but check specs.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure it will hook to intended desk (desk thickness).
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cool hammock
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and will not damage or scratch the visible part of the desk in any way. My desk is 4 feet wide, so if you have the hammock up high enough it's flat enough that my feet don't slide together.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Daniel

customer_reviews.title: more relaxed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving it so much! I work from home and sometimes spend 2-3 hours straigh sitting at my desk. I adjusted it at a mid height and it make me feel comfortable when I sit.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Powell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hammock for my friend, send him as a gift. He likes it very much. The product make him feel good when he sits he told me.
customer_reviews.author: anthony errol davis

customer_reviews.title: Swing for foot
customer_reviews.text: Just have fun and relax. Like a swing for my foot. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Make my job easier
customer_reviews.text: As an office worker, most of the time, I work in front of computer. After long time sitting, my body kind of hurts and sore, especially my legs. But now with this hanger, I can work more efficient, I gives deep relaxation to my legs. Easy installing or carry around, worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Saad Ojaiban

customer_reviews.title: At least their customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: My original review said that this product wasn't really working as intended, but they refunded me some money for changing this review, so here I am. What can I say?
customer_reviews.author: unclespoon

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have a small desk that is the perfect height and width to attach this thing
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a small desk that is the perfect height and width to attach this thing, don't bother buying it. Tried for days to get this thing to work only to throw it aside and then forget to return it. Might give it to someone who needs it. My desk is nearly 4 feet wide, with no back so I thought this would work. Nope, apparently it needs to hook PERFECTLY to the "sides" of the desk then hang under the desk, since my desk has a side drawer the rope is not long enough and even with my own rope it does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Psomaster

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces Large enough That Clamp To Desk To Make it Work...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it, seemed to be missing the clamps large enough to fit around the desk. received prompt refund upon returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clamps only fit two desk thicknesses, if you ...
customer_reviews.text: The clamps only fit two desk thicknesses, if you happen to be slightly larger or smaller the clamp will not hold, as is the case for me, so this does not work. The clamps should be adjustable and/or able to be tightened. The hammock itself is simple and could work with the right clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to try this product based on all the good reviews, but I'm afraid to order again and ...
customer_reviews.text: The clamps/rings I received were not as pictured, and do not support the hammock at all. I really wanted to try this product based on all the good reviews, but I'm afraid to order again and receive the wrong clamps a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Jo N.

product_meta.title: SMAGREHO Foot Hammock Portable Adjustable Office Under Desk Foot Sling, Orange
feature_bullets: SMAGREHO Under Desk Foot Hammock designed specifically for resting your feet, suitable for use anywhere, such as home, office, outdoors.
Easy to Setup - Free to fold, easy to carry. Just buckle the two hooks on both ends of your table and then wedge the ropes in the two hooks.
Free Adjustment - The length of the rope from 200 mm to 450 mm, you're free to adjust the height and mode. This foot rest hammock is more convenient than the makeshift chair.
High-Quality Material - Canvas, steel, polyethylene, wood (Lightweight and eco-friendly).
Satisfaction Guarantee - Any question, just contact us and we offer 24 x 7 email support, 12-month hassle-free warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars78 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
